main_definition: To share or publish a message, update, or content on social media platforms, online forums, or other digital channels.

meanings_and_examples.example: The postal worker will post the letters today.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To update a social media status or content
meanings_and_examples.example: I just got back from vacation, and I want to post some pictures on my Instagram now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A written message intended for public display or distribution
meanings_and_examples.example: The town hall announced a new policy in the community newsletter's latest issue.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To fix firmly into position, as by using nails or screws
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to post the decorations on the wall for their party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A message sent through a telecommunication system or online service
meanings_and_examples.example: She sent me an important post from her email account.
